text: Hermann Müller (18 May 1876 – 20 March 1931; ) was a German Social Democratic politician who was the foreign minister (1919–1920), and twice as the chancellor of Germany (1920, 1928–1930) in the Weimar Republic. He was one of the German signatories of the Treaty of Versailles (28 June 1919). ==References== Category:1876 births Category:1931 deaths Category:Chancellors of the Weimar Republic Category:Politicians from Mannheim Category:Politicians of the Social Democratic Party of Germany
title: Hermann Müller (politician)
